ch0004_41_toko/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Are you ready
to have some fun?
ch0004_41_toko/0101_0701_02_10:
Time flies! When there’s a festival around, you’ve
gotta seize the moment, or you’ll be left behind!
ch0004_41_toko/7101_0701_01_10:
It’s hard to tell how tired you are when you’re
super focused on something.
ch0004_41_toko/7101_0701_02_10:
You know how sometimes after a long day of
battling, you realize you’re so exhausted that you
just wanna plop down on the ground?
ch0004_41_toko/7101_0701_03_10:
That’s how much we have to enjoy festivals!
You gotta do so much that you can’t even
move afterwards!
ch0004_41_toko/7102_0701_01_10:
I promised my friends from Unova that we’d dance
at the summer festival.
ch0004_41_toko/7102_0701_02_10:
When the time comes, you should join us!
It’ll be even more fun with you around!
ch0004_41_toko/7103_0701_01_10:
Hey, check out this outfit! It’s easy to move around
in, and it’s also pretty cute!
ch0004_41_toko/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s supposed to be worn at festivals, I hear.
It kinda makes me wanna dance!
ch0004_41_toko/7104_0701_02_10:
She’s burning with so much fight, it’s almost as if
she turned red from all the passion she’s got!
ch0004_41_toko/7104_0701_03_10:
Someone from Galar saw her and totally did a
double take!
ch0004_41_toko/7105_0701_01_10:
What kinds of food do you like to eat at
festivals, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0004_41_toko/7105_0701_02_10:
I’d have a hard time choosing just one, because
everything looks so tasty! I love them all!
ch0004_41_toko/1701_0701_01_10:
Oh, there you are! I’ve been looking all over
for you!
ch0004_41_toko/1701_0702_01_10:
I found that while training with Grapploct at the
beach. You can have it!
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0701_01_10:
The hustle and bustle of a festival at night reminds
me of Castelia City.
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0701_02_10:
Maybe it’s because there’s so many people and
Pokémon all gathered together under a bunch of
multicolored lights!
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0701_03_10:
I like quiet spots, too, but I really like how lively
festivals can be!
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0702_01_10:
I know some people may not be up for it, and
some might not like how noisy it can get...
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0702_02_10:
For folks like that, it can also be fun to watch the
festival from a distance.
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0702_03_10: That’s another way to enjoy them!
ch0004_41_toko/2501_0702_04_10:
I think it’s fine to enjoy things at your own pace
if you need to.
ch0004_41_toko/2511_0701_02_10:
Checking out all the booths is fun, but the best
part of a festival is hanging out with your friends!
ch0004_41_toko/2511_0701_03_10:
Maybe I’m the only one who thinks this, but I wish
every day could be a festival day!
ch0004_41_toko/2511_0702_01_10:
I know that when an event only comes around
every once in a while, that’s part of what makes
it special.
ch0004_41_toko/2511_0702_02_10:
But even then, I think it’s best to enjoy every day
as much as I can!
ch0004_41_toko/3001_0701_01_10:
We’re burning with so much excitement today,
not even the sun can outshine us!
ch0004_41_toko/3003_0701_01_10:
I can’t wait for the next festival to come around!
Until then, let’s enjoy some Pokémon battles!
ch0004_41_toko/3005_0701_01_10:
Whenever you’re at a festival, you’ve gotta see
and try everything you can!
